power.title: Aggressive Familiar
power.fluff: As you use an arcane power, your familiar explodes, damaging creatures you hit

element.name: Requirement:
element.text: Your familiar must be in its active state

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Your familiar is destroyed, and you gain a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against creatures that were adjacent to your familiar. The bonus lasts until the end of the current turn.

power.title: Argent Falcon
power.fluff: Your familiar briefly transforms into a silver falcon, and shines with pure moonlight

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, your familiar sheds bright light in its space and each square within 3 squares of it. Enemies within the light grant combat advantage.

power.title: Balm of the Cultivator
power.fluff: Your enemy's attack releases healing energy within you, which you use to aid your friend

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: An enemy damages you with an attack

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Fury of the Elements
power.fluff: You channel elemental power used against you and unleash its fury against your foes

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: You take cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You take half damage from the triggering attack, and this power has the keyword or keywords for the triggering attack's damage type or types.
Your first attack before the end of your next turn deals 1d6 extra damage of the type or types dealt by the triggering attack.
